mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol
Class IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic

java.lang.Object
  mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.ControlLogic
      mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol.IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
Console.CommandHandler, Selectable.Handler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientInitializer.Client_ControlLogic, ServerInitializer.Server_ControlLogic
Enclosing class:
IdolInitializer
public static class IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic
extends ControlLogic
implements Console.CommandHandler

Basic ControlLogic with command console support. The command console, if enabled, understands four commands: help, set, print, quit. The comand console's range of commands can be expanded by overriding handleCommand(String).

Field Detail

IDOL_CONSOLE_PROP

public static final String IDOL_CONSOLE_PROP
The name of the property that determines if there is a Console. Acceptable values are "on" and "off". The default value of the property is "off".

See Also:
IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic(Properties), Constant Field Values

_console

final Console _console
The command console.

Constructor Detail

IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic

public IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic(Properties p)
Class constructor that uses the value of the property idol.initializer.console to determine if this Console_ControlLogic has a command console or not. If idol.initializer.console has the value on, then this Console_ControlLogic has a command console.

Parameters:
p - the Properties of this Console_ControlLogic.
Method Detail

handleCommand

public void handleCommand(String command)
Implements the help, set, print, and quit commands. The commands, their arguments, and their meanings are
  • help - Print the help message.
  • set <field name> <field value> - Assign the value to the field of the Entity's State.
  • print <field name> - Print the value of the field on the console.
  • quit - Force the Entity to terminate.

handleCommand ignores all other inputs.

Override handleCommand to extend the range of command strings it understands.

Specified by:
handleCommand in interface Console.CommandHandler
Parameters:
command - a string to interpret as a command

help

protected void help(String command)
Prints helpful text that describes how to control the Entity.

BUG: This implementation ignores command. It should not.

Parameters:
command - the command for which to print help. If command is null, then print the text for all known commands.

set

private void set(String command)
Change the value of one of the fields in the Entity's State. The new value of the field must be a Double.

Parameters:
command - the name of the field, separated by from its value by white space

set

private void set(String fieldname,
                 String command)
Change the value of one of the fields in the Entity's State. The new value must be a Double. Prints an error message if there is no such field.

Parameters:
fieldname - the name of the field
command - the new value of the field

print

private void print(String command)
Prints the value of a field of the Entity's State on the console. Prints an error message if there is no such field.

Parameters:
command - the name of the field

quit

protected void quit(String command)
Stops the command console, if there is one, then stops the Entity.

BUG - This implementation ignores command.

Parameters:
command - hints for quit
